required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: SHR-1210 in Recurrent/Metastatic Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma Who Have Received Previous At Least Two Lines of Chemotherapy.
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-arm, Open Label, Multi-center, Phase 2 Study of SHR-1210 in Recurrent/Metastatic Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma Patients Who Have Received Previous At Least Two Lines of Chemotherapy.

brief_summary.textblock: This is an open label, single-arm, multi-center, phase 2 Study of SHR-1210 in recurrent/metastatic nasopharyngeal carcinoma(R/M NPC) patients who have received previous at least two lines of chemotherapy.

detailed_description.textblock: The primary objective of this phase 2 study is to assess objective response rate of SHR-1210 in patients with R/M NPC. The secondary objective is to observe the duration of response, progression free survival, time to response, overall survival and safety of SHR-1210 in R/M NPC. ADA is also investigated.

primary_outcome.measure: Objective Response Rate (ORR) assess by Independent Review Committee (IRC)
primary_outcome.time_frame: from first patient first visit to 6 month after last patient first visit
primary_outcome.description: Based on Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors 1.1 (RECIST 1.1)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from first patient first visit to 6 month after last patient first visit
secondary_outcome.description: Based on Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors 1.1 (RECIST 1.1)
Based on Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors 1.1 (RECIST 1.1)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from first patient first visit to 6 month after last patient first visit
secondary_outcome.description: Based on Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors 1.1 (RECIST 1.1)
PFS as measured in accordance with the Response Evaluation Criteria In Solid Tumours (RECIST) version 1.1
Overall Survival is defined as the time from registration to death due to any cause, or censored at date last known alive. OS will be measured by the Method of Kaplan and Meier.

arm_group.description: SHR-1210 injection, 200 mg/dose, intravenous infusion over 30 minutes.

intervention.description: A humanized monoclonal immunoglobulin PD-1 antibody

overall_official.affiliation: Cancer Center of Sun-Yat Sen University (CCSYSU)

facility.name: Cancer Center of Sun-Yat Sen University (CCSYSU)
